Text.Page:
Are you with the local regimentâ€”Kaia's Sword? Can you help me?

My sons left home a few days ago, and I'm starting to get worried. Can you check up on them for me?

You're looking for Wynne's sons? Zebedah and Zebulon?

Sorry, didn't mean to get your hopes up. Haven't seen hide nor hair of them. I try to keep an eye on everything around here, but I'm no Balder. I can't see everything.

Check with {@LinkCreature:212#1001#Munam}. Don't let the gruff act fool you. He's the biggest gossip I've ever met.

Did you say that you're here on Wynne's request? What do you mean the children have disappeared? There are so many things happening, I haven't received a report on that one yet. There was a child wandering around here a few days ago. Why don't you ask the guards as you look around the campsite? I'm sorry I'm not much of a help. Anway, it's great to have you back in one piece.
